ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( tc9_util__Junction_Effective_Date__c < tc9_util__Effective_Date__c, AND(isnull(tc9_util__Junction_Expiry_Date__c),NOT(isnull(tc9_util__Expiry_Date__c))), tc9_util__Junction_Expiry_Date__c > tc9_util__Expiry_Date__c), tc9_util__Overide_Validation__c = false, NOT(ischanged(tc9_util__Overide_Validation__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check your dates are within the PO dates
